video_identification.title: Yosef Weitz and the 1948 Plan to Prevent Palestinian Return #rightofreturn #gaza #podcast

extracted_metadata.description: As head of the Jewish National Fundâ€™s Land Department, Yosef Weitz led the Transfer Committee. The Transfer Committee played a crucial part in the expulsion of the Palestinians in 1948. In this episode, Dr. Yaara Benger Alaluf unpacks the importance of this document and its recommendations for preventing the return of refugees.
